thread.section_title: MacKeeper Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von MacKeeper | mackeeper.com
thread.title: Chevy Ordner

author: Chevy Ordner
title: Chevy Ordner
text:
For YEARS I never worried about virus control or cleaning up my Mac because Macs have always been pretty much invincible but with all things over time we must improve the protection of our technological gadgets.
The first time a MacKeeper assistant popped up to chat I was very busy and also became frustrated with this person who contacted me without my request PUSHING me to make the expenditure.
But this time I knew it was time to renew my subscription. So I opened MacKeeper and was immediately contacted via chat by an assistant. I shortly discussed renewing my license. I also inquired about savings or a coupon which he provided me a code for a 15% discount without further discussion.
He wasn't pushy and didn't force me to allow himself or another agent to remotely handle installation, etc. I am now updated for 24 months which will transfer over should I need to upgrade my now 8 year old LT. Overall I was pleased with the experience and simplicity of the process and product.
